classes.name: LabelEditor
classes.description:
Base class for all draw2d.shape.basic.Label editors. The default implementation is to open a simple javascript prompt dialog.
Use LabelInplaceEditor or your own implementation if you need more comfort.

parameters.name: attr
parameters.description: callback handler and configuration. { onCommit:function(){}}, onCancel: function(){}, onStart: function(){}, text:'My Dialog Title' }

functions.name: start
functions.description: Trigger the edit of the label text.

constructor.name: LabelEditor

functions.name: start
functions.description: Trigger the edit of the label text.

functions.name: positionInput
functions.description: Position the input element over the label

functions.name: installScrollHandler
functions.description: Install scroll handler to reposition input when scrollArea scrolls

functions.name: installZoomHandler
functions.description: Install zoom handler to reposition input when canvas zooms

functions.name: installAutoResize
functions.description: Install auto-resize behavior on an input element. Automatically adjusts the input width based on content.

functions.name: commit
functions.description:
Transfer the data from the editor into the label.
Remove the editor.

functions.name: cancel
functions.description:
Transfer the data from the editor into the label.
Remove the editor.

parameters.name: attr
parameters.description: callback handler and configuration. { onCommit:function(){}}, onCancel: function(){}, onStart: function(){}, text:'My Dialog Title' }
